trans-unit.source: Specifies the resource consumed by the member of a class.
trans-unit.target: 指定類別 (Class) 成員消耗的資源。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceConsumptionAttribute> attribute is applied to a member, the <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceExposureAttribute> attribute must also be applied.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceConsumptionAttribute>屬性套用至成員，<xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceExposureAttribute>還必須套用屬性。

trans-unit.source: If the resource scope of the consumed resource is different than the resource scope of how it is consumed, the constructor that takes a `consumptionScope` parameter should be used to specify how the resource is consumed.
trans-unit.target: 如果資源的範圍已使用的資源是不同資源範圍的使用方式，建構函式採用，`consumptionScope`參數應該用來指定資源的使用方式。

trans-unit.source: For example, a resource may be exposed as a <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Machine> resource, but only used at the <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Process> and <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Assembly> scope.
trans-unit.target: 例如，資源可能會公開為<xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Machine>資源，但只適用於在<xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Process>和<xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Assembly>範圍。

trans-unit.source: For this example the `consumptionScope` parameter is set to <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Process> | <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Assembly>.
trans-unit.target: 此範例中`consumptionScope`參數設定為<xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Process> | <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Assembly>。

trans-unit.source: The `resourceScope` parameter in the constructor must specify a <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope> greater than or equal to the resource exposure of all called members.
trans-unit.target: `resourceScope`建構函式中的參數必須指定<xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope>大於或等於資源曝光的所有呼叫的成員。

trans-unit.source: For example, a method consuming two <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Process> resources and one <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Machine> resource would be identified as consuming a <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Machine> and a <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Process> resource by setting `resourceScope` to <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Machine> | <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Process>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，使用兩個方法<xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Process>資源，另一個<xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Machine>資源會被視為耗用<xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Machine>和<xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Process>藉由設定資源`resourceScope`來<xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Machine> | <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Process>。

trans-unit.source: `Public` members cannot expose <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Assembly> or <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Private> resources.
trans-unit.target: `Public` 成員無法公開<xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Assembly>或<xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Private>資源。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Assembly> members cannot expose <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Private> resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Assembly> 成員無法公開<xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Private>資源。

trans-unit.source: The graph of methods terminates when a <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceExposureAttribute> attribute with a resource scope of <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.None> is applied to a method.
trans-unit.target: 方法的圖形會終止時<xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceExposureAttribute>屬性的範圍為資源<xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.None>套用至方法。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceConsumptionAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceConsumptionAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope" /> for the consumed resource.
trans-unit.target: 消耗之資源的 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceConsumptionAttribute" /> class specifying the scope of the consumed resource.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceConsumptionAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體，該類別指定消耗之資源的範圍。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope" /> for the consumed resource.
trans-unit.target: 消耗之資源的 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope" /> used by this member.
trans-unit.target: 由這個成員使用的 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceConsumptionAttribute" /> class specifying the scope of the consumed resource and the scope of how it is consumed.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceConsumptionAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體，該類別指定消耗之資源的範圍以及資源消耗方式的範圍。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceExposureAttribute> attribute specifies a scope of <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.None>, then the <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceConsumptionAttribute> attribute must specify a resource it consumes and how it consumes it, by specifying a value for the `consumptionScope` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceExposureAttribute>屬性指定的範圍<xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.None>，然後在<xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceConsumptionAttribute>屬性必須指定會耗用資源，然後它會取用方式，藉由指定的值`consumptionScope`參數。

trans-unit.source: The scope specified by `consumptionScope` should be less than or equal to the scope specified by `resourceScope`.
trans-unit.target: 所指定之範圍`consumptionScope`應該要小於或等於所指定之範圍`resourceScope`。

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Process> scope can be consumed as a <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Process> or <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.AppDomain> scope, but not as a <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Machine> scope.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Process>範圍可做為<xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Process>或<xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.AppDomain>範圍，但不是能作為<xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Machine>範圍。

trans-unit.source: Gets the consumption scope for this member.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個成員的消耗範圍。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope" /> object specifying the resource scope used by this member.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope" /> 物件，指定這個成員使用的資源範圍。

trans-unit.source: Gets the resource scope for the consumed resource.
trans-unit.target: 取得消耗之資源的資源範圍 。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope" /> object specifying the resource scope of the consumed member.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope" /> 物件，指定消耗之成員的資源範圍。
